attributes.action: Terminate all MPs that Block Brexit and leave the EU with or without a deal.
attributes.background: all politicians that do not respect the outcome of the referendum should have their employments terminated immediately. They have shown a disrespect for our democratic vote, so lets show them the door.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254329
